<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets [[effectiveCommander]] of the given vehicle. Effective commander is the person who commands the vehicle, i.e. gives commands to the driver. Every time a person gets in or out of a vehicle, effective commander eligibility is recalculated by the engine based on the current [[crew]]. Use this command to force desired effective commander. In multiplayer, execute globally. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>vehicle [[setEffectiveCommander]] person </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setEffectiveCommander]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[effectiveCommander]], [[commander]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
